content.rendered:
Directed by Peter Cattaneo.

Written by Anthony Horowitz. Anthony Horowitz. Tim Morris.

Cast Lesley Manville (Susan Ryeland). Tim McMullan (Atticus PÃ¼nd). Ian Lloyd Anderson (Brent). Karen Westwood (Mary Blakiston). Matthew Beard (Fraser). Jude Hill (Young Sam). Alexandros Logothetis (Andreas Patakis). Harry Lawtey (Robert Blakiston). Pippa Haywood (Claire Jenkins). Michael Maloney (Charles Clover). Daniel Mays (Chubb). Claire Rushbrook (Katie Williams). Joel Birkett (Young Robert). Nia Deacon (Joy Sanderling). Dorothy Atkinson (Lady Frances Pye). Chu Omambala (Rev Osborne). Karl Collins (Jack White). Lorcan Cranitch (Max Ryeland). Sanjeev Kohli (Dr Kamal). Sutara Gayle (Gemma Whiteley). Nathan Clarke (Freddy). Danielle Ryan (Alice). David Herlihy (Matthew Blakiston). Paul Tylak (Lee Jaffery). Adam Ewan (Gravedigger). San Shella (Chris Fletcher). Azeem Alahi (Aziz). Daniel Costello (Doctor).

Language English.

Producers Peter Cattaneo. Jill Green. Anthony Horowitz. Lesley Manville. Suzanne McAuley. Anneliese O’Callaghan. Susanne Simpson.

Production Eleventh Hour Films. PBS Masterpiece. BritBox.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 6

Status On Going (2022–)
